bibl.title: Ancient Perceptions of Greek Ethnicity
bibl.note: Asks what the claim to being Greek may have meant in Hellenistic Egypt both to those who claimed Greek ethnicity and to those with whom they were in contact.
THOMPSON Dorothy J., Hellenistic Hellenes: The Case of Ptolemaic Egypt.
Irad MALKIN (Ed.), Ancient Perceptions of Greek Ethnicity = Center for Hellenic Studies Colloquia (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Massachusetts, 2001) pp. 301-322.
